DataElement.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Used to Aid or Improve Erections Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of whether or not they have used any medications or devices to aid or improve erections.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement Used Medications or Devices to Aid or Improve Erections
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer._A question about whether an individual uses or used medications or devices to aid or improve erections.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.

Concepts.longName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite, Sexual Medications/Devices Supplement
Concepts.definition: A component of the EPIC designed to assess the use of erectile aids among patients treated for prostate cancer.

Property.preferredName: Used Medications or Devices to Aid or Improve Erections

Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual uses or used medications or devices to aid or improve erections.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
